input1: Save me! I really can do meal prep for the week!
input2: The secret of fitness lies in consistency?
input1_ans: "Save Me! I Really Can Do Meal Prep for the Week – Here’s How You Can Too!"

Here are some variations of your title using the provided themes and structures:

1. **Save me! I really can do meal prep for the week!**
2. **Can't believe someone can say meal prep is easy, I really can do it for the week!**
3. **Girls must learn meal prep! Mind-blowing tips inside!**
4. **Everyone can learn! Deep dive into my weekly meal prep tactics!**
5. **Regret not starting meal prep earlier!**
6. **The meal prep questions that have been asked many times when I go out, never lose when I meal prep!**
7. **Reject being unorganized | 5 things that meal preppers should check in!**
8. **I would be sad if anyone missed this meal prep guide, ok?**
9. **The meal prep pitfall that 90% of novices can't avoid! Regret not knowing earlier!**
10. **The most effective meal prep tips on the internet, it's the bomb in my heart!**
11. **I declare meal prep is here with 7 easy recipes!**
12. **How did I not discover this meal prep artifact earlier!**
13. **Save me sos who invented this meal prep method! Didn't expect it to be so delicious!**
14. **Only 1% know about meal prep hacks, but it can make you save time!**
15. **The secret of meal prep 100k+, is planning ahead!**
16. **Learn these three points, guarantee to make you a meal prep pro!**
17. **The difference between chaotic meals and organized meals, is it meal prep?**
18. **When you meal prep, others have already planned their week!**
19. **Where is the same meal prep better than takeout?**
20. **Are you like me, struggling with meal prep?**
21. **Everyone is meal prepping just because it saves time!**
22. **Don’t think you can meal prep, then you can totally do it!**
23. **Behind the meal prep explosion, is smart planning!**
24. **When everyone is caring about takeout, we meal prep!**
25. **The 3 important things you can learn from meal prepping!**
26. **The secret of meal prep lies in organization!**
27. **Those unforgettable meal prep tips guarantee you remember for a lifetime!**
28. **How to make meal prep that is both healthy and delicious?**
29. **Must collect meal prep recipes, maybe they will come in handy one day!**
30. **24 Meal Prep Bloggers | Learn meal prep depends on it!**
31. **Meal prep for a year, how did it reward me?**
32. **What's the matter with overthinking meal prep in a busy schedule?**
33. **Meal prep girl, how to meal prep to look good?**
34. **Please let big data recommend this to meal prep enthusiasts!**
35. **Meal prep dry goods, 40 meal prep professional terms!**
36. **Meal prep free tutorial! No one would still pay to learn meal prep, right?**
37. **No way! You still have to pay for meal prep advice?**
38. **The meal prep tips that 99% don't know, let you save time!**
39. **Save your personal chef money! Help you make a meal prep beginner plan!**

Feel free to mix and match or modify any of these titles to better suit your needs!
input2_ans: "Unlocking the Secret of Fitness: Why Consistency is Your Ultimate Key to Success!"

Here are some creative title variations based on your prompt "The secret of fitness lies in consistency":

1. "Save me! I really can achieve my fitness goals with consistency!"
2. "Can't believe someone can say consistency is key, I really can transform my body!"
3. "Girls must learn the power of consistency! Mind-blowing fitness secrets!"
4. "Everyone can learn! Deep dive into fitness consistency tactics!"
5. "Regret not sticking to a routine earlier? Discover the secret now!"
6. "The fitness question that has been asked many times: How to stay consistent?"
7. "Reject to be sloppy | 5 things that fitness enthusiasts should check in for consistency!"
8. "I would be sad if anyone missed this consistency tip for fitness, ok?"
9. "The consistency pitfall that 90% of novices can't avoid! Regret not knowing earlier!"
10. "The most effective fitness secret on the internet, it's the bomb in my heart!"
11. "I declare consistency is here with 5 fitness hacks!"
12. "How did I not discover this consistency artifact earlier in my fitness journey!"
13. "Save me sos who invented this consistency method! Didn't expect it to be so effective!"
14. "Only 1% know about the power of consistency, but it can make you fit!"
15. "The secret of fitness success 100k+, is consistency!"
16. "Learn these three points about consistency, guarantee to make you fit!"
17. "The difference between fit and unfit is often just consistency!"
18. "When you skip workouts, others have already built consistency!"
19. "Where is the same workout better than another? It's all about consistency!"
20. "Are you like me, struggling with consistency in fitness?"
21. "Everyone is fit just because they embraced consistency!"
22. "Don’t think you can be fit, then you can achieve consistency!"
23. "Behind the fitness explosion, is the power of consistency!"
24. "When everyone is caring about quick fixes, we focus on consistency!"
25. "The 3 important things you can learn from consistent fitness routines!"
26. "The secret of fitness lies in consistency, right?"
27. "Those unforgettable fitness moments guarantee you remember the power of consistency for a lifetime!"
28. "How to make a fitness routine that is both effective and consistent?"
29. "Must collect tips on consistency, maybe it will come in handy one day!"
30. "24 Fitness Bloggers | Learn consistency depends on it!"
31. "Consistency for a year, how did it reward my fitness journey?"
32. "What's the matter with overthinking consistency in fitness?"
33. "Fitness girl, how to stay consistent to look good?"
34. "Please let big data recommend this to fitness enthusiasts!"
35. "Fitness dry goods, 40 professional terms on consistency!"
36. "Fat reduction dry goods, already reduced 10 pounds, consistency + workout plan!"
37. "Fitness free tutorial! No one would still pay to learn about consistency, right!"
38. "No way! You still have to pay for consistency tips?"
39. "The consistency secret that 99% don't know, let you achieve your fitness goals!"
40. "Save your personal trainer money! Help you make a beginner fitness plan focused on consistency!" 

Feel free to mix and match elements from these titles to create the perfect one for your needs!
